title: Put back to checkpoint 0 in honor 1
body: Yesterday when I was playing, the game told me I was at checkpoint 2 out of 3 in honor 0 and now I see it says 0 out of 3.

replies.body:
Hey folks, this was a bug on our end, we're working on fixing it, you won't lose checkpoints if you're below level 2.  You'll be set correctly soon - hopefully within a day or so.

For reference:

https://twitter.com/RiotSupport/status/1088580328489312256
This is due to new ranked season, if you were above honor 2, you got reset to honor 2, no check points. If below 2, you'd reset to checkpoint 0 as well. Ranks and honor reset annually.

> [{quoted}](name=Nørse,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=dK3trwE4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-01-24T23:35:38.214+0000)
>
> This is due to new ranked season, if you were above honor 2, you got reset to honor 2, no check points. If below 2, you'd reset to checkpoint 0 as well. Ranks and honor reset annually.

That’s actually such bullshit if you’re a checkpoint or two away from being honor level two.
